title: Herbert W. Armstrong - Plain Truth Magazine 1982-1983 (PDF)
description:
The Plain Truth is a magazine of understanding, viewing world events through the 

lenses of bible prophecy. The Plain Truth was always a magazine ahead of it's 

time. The Plain Truth began in 1934 and was the premier publication of the 

Worldwide Church of God under Mr. Armstrong. The Plain Truth peaked in the 1980's 

with over 8 million subscriptions monthly. After the death of Mr. Armstrong in 

1986, the plain truth, like everything in the WCG disintegrated into nothingness.


Complete Collection of every plain truth ever produced!!! Such a massive 

collection I had to break it in parts. My torrent program kept crashing everytime 

I tried to do the whole directory. Enjoy and PLEASE SEED!!!


Part 6 of 7
